name: 2DGameManias Taken
description: 2DGameManias Taken is a 2.5D retro platform game in which you have been Taken by the unknown and you need to fight your way to freedom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64-bit Only Processor: 3.0 Ghz processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA速 GeForce速 GTX 670 or AMD Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64-bit Only Processor: 3.5Ghz processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA速 GeForce速 GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1300 MB available space
